member.summary: Main driver class to handle logic of the genetic algorithm

member.summary: Number of individuals contained in every generation

member.summary: Ratio of best individuals in every generation to be carried over without changes

member.summary: Creates an instance of GA with a random initial population sample
member.param: Fitness calculator to be used by the GA

member.name: M:Genetic_Algorithm.GA.GeneticAlgorithm`2.#ctor(Genetic_Algorithm.GA.IFitnessCalculator{`0,`1},System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{`0})
member.summary: Creates an instance of GA whose initial population contains certain individuals (+ additional random individuals if defined population size is larger than number of defined ones)
member.param: Fitness calculator to be used by the GA

member.name: M:Genetic_Algorithm.GA.IFitnessCalculator`2.IndividualFitness(`0)
member.summary: Calculate fitness value for the whole individual
member.param: GA Individual to calculate for

member.summary: Calculate fitness for a specific gene in relationship to the whole individual
member.param: Gene to calculate fitness for
Owner of the gene

member.summary: Represents GA Gene with a specified encoded object

member.name: T:Genetic_Algorithm.GA.IGeneticAlgorithmAdapter`2
member.summary: Provides methods for manipulating populations in GA to produce new generations

member.name: M:Genetic_Algorithm.GA.IGeneticAlgorithmAdapter`2.SelectForRouletteBreeding(Genetic_Algorithm.GA.Population{`0,`1},System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{`0})
member.summary: Chooses an individual for further reproduction based on roulette-rules
member.param: Population to choose from
Individuals which cannot be selected for breeding. Use primarily if you want to prevent an individual from breeding with itself

member.name: M:Genetic_Algorithm.GA.IGeneticAlgorithmAdapter`2.SelectSteadyStateSurvivors(Genetic_Algorithm.GA.Population{`0,`1},System.Double)
member.summary: Selects fittest part of the population to transfer into the next generation
member.param: Population to choose from
Proportion of individuals to keep alive

member.name: M:Genetic_Algorithm.GA.IGeneticAlgorithmAdapter`2.CrossOver(`0,`0)
member.summary: Creates a new child from the genomes of two parents
member.param: First parent to cross over
Second parent to cross over

member.name: M:Genetic_Algorithm.GA.IGeneticAlgorithmAdapter`2.CrossoverShouldOccur(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether a crossover of genomes between individuals should occur based on crossover probability
member.param: Percentage value indicating how likely crossover should be to occur
member.returns: True to crossover, False to forbid crossover

member.name: M:Genetic_Algorithm.GA.IGeneticAlgorithmAdapter`2.Mutate(`0)
member.summary: Invoke mutation on an individual

member.summary: Invoke mutation on every non-elite member of population
member.param: Population to perform mutation on

member.name: T:Genetic_Algorithm.GA.Population`2
member.summary: Collection of individuals in a genetic algorithm
member.typeparam: Type of the individual in the population
Type of the gene encoded in individual's genome

member.summary: Construct a population of random individuals
member.param: Number of individuals to add
Size of the population which needs to be reached to be considered "adequately filled"

member.summary: Represents an organism/individual in a genetic algorithm
member.typeparam: Type of genes which define the individual's traits

member.name: P:Genetic_Algorithm.GA.IIndividual`1.Name
member.summary: String identifier for the specific individual

member.name: P:Genetic_Algorithm.GA.IIndividual`1.IsElite
member.summary: Indicates whether the individual is currently the elite member of its generation. Elite individuals will be copied over to the next generation without any mutations.

member.name: M:Genetic_Algorithm.GA.IIndividual`1.Reproduce(Genetic_Algorithm.GA.IIndividual{`0})
member.summary: Create new offspring using this and another individual
member.param: Other individual to mate with
member.returns: New offspring resulting from genetic recombination of parents

member.name: M:Genetic_Algorithm.GA.IIndividual`1.Mutate
member.summary: Allow for random alteration of the individual's genome

member.name: T:Genetic_Algorithm.GA.PolygonGene
member.summary: Represents genetic information about one vertex of a polygon

member.name: P:Genetic_Algorithm.GA.PolygonGene.AngleRelativeToCentroid
member.summary: Represents angle on a circle relative to whole individual's centroid. 0째 to the right, 90째 up, 180째 left, 270째 down

member.name: T:Genetic_Algorithm.GA.SelectionType
member.summary: Defines different methods of selecting individuals to advance into further generations

member.name: F:Genetic_Algorithm.GA.SelectionType.Roulette
member.summary: Every individual's fitness proportionally increases its chance to be selected. If an individual's fitness makes up 30% of the whole population's summed scores, the individual has 30% chance to be selected.

member.name: F:Genetic_Algorithm.GA.SelectionType.SteadyState
member.summary: Larger group of individuals is selected to survive into next generation. Certain percentage of individuals gets "killed", the remainder continues (and possibly gets mutated) and creates new offspring to fill the gap after the killed individuals.

member.name: T:Genetic_Algorithm.GA.SettingsAccessor
member.summary: Serves as an intermediary to the Genetic Algorithm's settings
